description: My apt is located three stops from Manhattan of the L train.  In 15 minutes you are in Union square.  The street is really quiet but you are 10 min walking from the busy streets in williamsburg (Bedford st and Nc Carren park).  We will provide you with all the needs in order to give you the best accomodation.
name: Nice Studio in Williamsburg
review:
Great Apartment  in a cool neighborhood. Javier was easy to communicate with and we would stay there again and recommend to others.

Arndis and Inga
